alert.note: Alert for Dallas (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 22 at 1:32PM CDT until August 23 at 7:05AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Fort Worth TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... West Fork Trinity River At Grand Prairie affecting Dallas County. For the West Fork Trinity River...including Jacksboro, Boyd, Fort Worth, Grand Prairie...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...West Fork Trinity River At Grand Prairie. * WHEN...From this afternoon to tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 30.0 feet, Moderate flooding will occur along the lowland areas of the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 AM CDT Monday the stage was 25.1 feet. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage to 28.5 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening and remain below flood stage. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
